info.name: smin3 - three way smin demo
info.description:
Slight expansion of https://www.shadertoy.com/view/4sSyRy
1  To the left: regular nested smin, asymmetric result. (Thanks Doug for pointing this example out.)
2  Middle: smin3 sorted nested smin acending order, rounded result
3  Right:  -||- ..decending

info.name: 2d  grass texture with a twist
info.description:
2d texture from https://www.shadertoy.com/view/WsSGWd 	Created by BynaryCobweb
 Strand directionality and length is determined by the angle between the ground and ray direction
Some rotor wash artifacts on closeup and obviously nothing on the ridges.

info.name: ChamferBox Super Primitive
info.description:
My goal was  a super primitive of a Chamfer Box that also take a secondary rounding parameter on the new edges. Sphere, Cuboid and Octahedron in one continuum.
finalized 2019 with function sdOctahedron( in vec3 p, in float s)// by Iq

info.name: Cone capsule
info.description:
three bones of cone capsules special "synaptic" blend mode and normaldriven bump texture.
Looping thou combinations of three blend parameters and two bump noise parameters  (roughness and depth).
Useful for bone and exoskeleton modelling

info.name: House: shape over shape
info.description:
House UPDATED: more fidelity  
Sorry for the messy code, Just a plaything so far.
More than just a lathe in my opinion.
use one 2d SDF to find a 2D dist of  say ( X , Y )  then use that  with remaining axis Z to look up another 2d SDF  (dist , Z)

renderpass.name: Image

info.name: Inverse Spherical Fibonacci UV
info.description: Spherical Fibonacci points, as described by this paper [url]https://dokumen.tips/documents/spherical-fibonacci-mapping-fibonacci-mapping-benjamin-keinert-1matthias-innmann.html[/url]

info.name: Local UV from along +  dist
info.description: Playing  with distance functions that return a distans + a more or less perpendicular  "along" component for building a secondary SDF in the local coordinate system. Oblivious care needs to be taken when modelling.

info.name: bgr5
info.description: This shader shows how to use the Common tab in Shadertoy. All tabs inherit the code of the Common tab. Here, that's used to get the Image and the Sound shader to conveniently share the music pattern generator, so they can display and play it respectively.
